name: MLCReductionType
desc: Constants that describe a reduction operation type.

items.name: case all
items.desc: A reduction operation that applies to all dimensions.

items.name: case any
items.desc: A reduction operation that applies to any dimension.

items.name: case argMax
items.desc: A reduction operation that applies to the maximum dimension you specify.

items.name: case argMin
items.desc: A reduction operation that applies to the minimum dimension you specify.

items.name: case max
items.desc: A reduction operation that applies to the maximum dimension.

items.name: case mean
items.desc: A reduction operation that applies to the mean of the dimensions.

items.name: case min
items.desc: A reduction operation that applies to the minimum dimension.

items.name: case none
items.desc: A reduction operation that applies no reduction.

items.name: case sum
items.desc: A reduction operation that applies to the sum of the dimensions.

items.name: case l1Norm
items.desc: A reduction operation that applies a lasso regularization penalty.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual description of the reduction operation you use for debugging.
